keyMappings:
unmap i
unmap ^
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap W

map U scrollFullPageUp
map D scrollFullPageDown

map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map <A-<> moveTabLeft count=99
map <A->> moveTabRight count=99

map R reload hard

map @ moveTabToNewWindow

map s Vomnibar.activate keyword=g
map S Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=g
searchEngines:
# Google
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google

# Image
i: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&tbm=isch Google Image

# Maps
m: https://maps.google.com/maps?q=%s&um=1&ie=UTF-8 Google Maps

# Translate
t: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translate
tf: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|fr|%s Google Translate

# Wikipedia
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia (en)
wf: https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia (fr)

# Youtube
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s&page={startPage?}&utm_source=opensearch Youtube
